name: A Cold Blade Like a Shadow
description: After your Lynette, who has this card equipped, uses Enigmatic Feint for the second time this Round: deals +2 DMG and forces your opponent to switch to their previous character.
descriptionraw: After your $[A1508], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S15082]</color> for the second time this Round: deals +2 DMG and forces your opponent to switch to their previous character.
descriptionreplaced: After your Lynette, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Enigmatic Feint</color> for the second time this Round: deals +2 DMG and forces your opponent to switch to their previous character.
